narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Aide4u Homecare, Inc. is a Home Health provider based in Brooklyn, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $60.1M in Medicaid payments across 430K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $60.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
